name: Hacker9 Version 1.0 English translation version
description:
Hacker9 is an action game where you explore dungeons and facilities, and collect servers.
There will be times when you will encounter various traps and events, and obtain dropped items along the way.

●Source Providers

Sound Effects……「The Match Makers」OSA-sama
http://kikyou.sakura.ne.jp/~osabisi/
Music………「Pianos DauGe」-sama
http://pianosdauge.org/
translation………Micheal R.-sama 、TCE-sama

●Operating Systems

Windows 7 Windows 8 Windows 8.1 Windows 10

●Uninstalling Hacker9

Delete the entire extracted 「hacker9_1000」 folder.

●Loading the game

Double-click [hacker9.exe].
